CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate - Class in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn
cloud formation: create stack based on: stack name, stack template (CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackTemplateFile), stack parameters (CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackPropertiesInputFile + CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackInputParams), and produce a stack output (CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackPropertiesOutputFile) ; wait for completion or fail (CarrotAwsCloudForm.stackTimeout)
CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate() - Constructor for class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn.CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate
 
CarrotAwsCloudFormDelete - Class in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn
cloud formation: delete stack based on: stack name; ; wait for completion or fail (CarrotAwsCloudForm.stackTimeout)

imageInstanceId - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc.CarrotAwsElasCompImageReg
AWS ElasticCompute instance id to use for image create; if provided explicitly in pom.xml, then it will override value form properties file; this value must come either from image properties file of from pom.xml properties
imageName - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc.CarrotAwsElasCompImageReg
AWS ElasticCompute ami image name; must be unique under your aws account;
imageName - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc.CarrotAwsElasCompImageUnReg

imagePropertiesInputFile - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc.CarrotAwsElasCompImageReg
AWS ElasticCompute image create input properties file; normally created by previous cloud formation invocation; must include InstanceId property;
imagePropertyInstanceId - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc.CarrotAwsElasCompImageReg
name of the property in input properties file that will be used to discover InstanceId to use as basis for image create operation

stackName - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn.CarrotAwsCloudForm
AWS CloudFormation stack name; must be unique under your aws account / region
stackPropertiesInputFile - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn.CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate

stackPropertiesOutputFile - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ssh.CarrotAwsSecuShel

stackServerId - Variable in class com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn.CarrotAwsCloudForm
